response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be equally valuable to you. After careful consideration, I am extending a special offer to you to purchase this product at a price of $1,300,000. I am confident that this price reflects the true worth of the product while allowing us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Please let me know if you require any additional information or if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1300000}
